name: Musician
desc: This round is nullified and put on hold.

name: Princess
desc: If your opponent plays the Prince, you automatically win the game.

name: Spy
desc: Next round, your opponent reveals their card before you choose yours.

name: Ambassador
desc: If you win with this card, it counts as 2 victories.

name: Wizard
desc: Nullifies the special power of your opponent's card.

name: General
desc: The card in your next round gets +2 strength.
